leitej.crypto.symmetric

Class CircBlockCipher

  • java.lang.Object
    • leitej.crypto.symmetric.CircBlockCipher

  • public final class CircBlockCipher
extends java.lang.Object
    Segmented Integer Counter - Input Rotate - Partial Block Chaining (SICIRPBC) or Counter Input Rotate Chaining (CIRC)
    Author:
    Julio Leite
